amendment.description: Amendment sought to continue the prohibition on the Christmas tree tax by striking the section of the bill that lifts the stay on the tax.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 45 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to continue the prohibition on the Christmas tree tax by striking the section of the bill that lifts the stay on the tax.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 227 (Roll no. 274).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 227 (Roll no. 274).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mrs. Walorski.
